archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.5.6a: a) using the underlying technical security infrastructure (e.g. Identity and Access Management (IAM), Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), patch management and security event logging)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
